text: Sumo ononro namekusted ʙa tavonoi va qudrati xud, Alloh ʙud, ki onhoro mekust ʙo in ki sumoro ʙar kustani onho qodir gardonid. Va on goh, ki reg ʙa sui onon andoxti, ʙar rui musrikon ʙirasid, tu najandoxti, ʙalki Alloh andoxt to mu'minonro xuʙ ʙiozmojad va ʙa vasilai cihod ʙa ʙolotarin daracaho ʙirasonad. Va ne'mati xudasro ʙar onho sinosonad, to ki sukri Uro ʙa co orand. Alʙatta, Alloh ʙa du'o va guftahoe, ki pinhon jo oskor medored, sunavo ast va on ci dar on salohi ʙandagonas ast, donost
